results:
Based on my search results, here's what I found about The Hobbit's social media presence on Instagram in 2024:

## Popular Hashtags

The most popular hashtags for The Hobbit content on Instagram in 2024 include: #hobbit #lordoftherings #lotr #tolkien #thehobbit #middleearth #jrrtolkien #gandalf #thelordoftherings #legolas #frodo #fantasy #bilbobaggins #aragorn #sauron #silmarillion #hobbiton #bilbo #frodobaggins #hobbits #hobbithouse #art #lotrmemes #tolkienart #mordor #gimli #elves #gollum #theshire #elf(no content)Additional hashtags for specific Hobbit-themed content include: #HobbitCostumeContest #HobbitCostume #HobbitQuiz #HobbitTrivia #HobbitBookRecommendation #BooksLikeHobbit #HobbitShire #HobbitCafe #HobbitHome #HobbitMerchandise #HobbitTshirts #HobbitCups #HobbitProducts #HobbitArt #HobbitCraft #HobbitDayArt #HobbitGiveaway #HobbitDayPrizes(no content)More specific hashtags include: #hobbitday #hobbitland #hobbitcosplay #hobbitcon #hobbitsbg #hobbitdoor #hobbitmovie #hobbitmemes #hobbitedit #hobbithill #hobbitcafe #hobbitmeme #hobbitnations #hobbitshirt #hobbittshirt #hobbitgirl

## Fan Accounts

Two notable Instagram fan accounts dedicated to The Hobbit and Lord of the Rings content include:

1. @thehobbitfacts - "LOTR & The Hobbit Facts 💍"
2. @thehobbitmovie - "The Hobbit & LOTR"

## Content Creation Strategies

Content creators are using charming Hobbit Day social media post ideas to engage their audience and celebrate the magic of Middle-earth. Popular content types include:

- Hobbit quizzes and trivia to encourage fan engagement, covering characters, storylines, and facts about the story
- Hobbit-themed artwork, crafts, and illustrations
- Fan features showing followers dressed as their favorite characters with creative costumes and makeup
- Content about Hobbit-inspired places and filming locations

## Platform Statistics

The hashtag #hobbit has approximately 1.4 million posts on Instagram, with related hashtags showing significant engagement: #lotr has 2.74 million posts, #lordoftherings has 2.63 million posts, and #thehobbit has 1.6 million posts(no content)Hashtag generators have analyzed the most popular hashtags relating to #hobbit to help content creators maximize likes and attract new followers on Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube

The Hobbit maintains a strong social media presence on Instagram in 2024, with active fan communities, dedicated content creators, and millions of posts using related hashtags. The content spans from movie appreciation to book discussions, cosplay, merchandise, and location-based content, showing the enduring popularity of Tolkien's work on the platform.
